What is an eSIM?

An eSIM (embedded SIM) is a digital SIM card that lets you connect to mobile networks without a physical SIM card. Perfect for international travel, eSIMs eliminate expensive roaming charges and give you instant connectivity in 170+ countries.

🚫 No Physical SIM

Digital activation via QR code

🌍 Global Coverage

Works in 170+ countries worldwide

💰 Cost Effective

Much cheaper than roaming charges
